trans-unit.source: BizTalk Services tasks in Azure Management Portal
trans-unit.target: BizTalk Services tasks in Azure Management Portal

trans-unit.source: This topic explains the <token>af_integration</token> tasks in the <token>azportal</token>.
trans-unit.target: This topic explains the <token>af_integration</token> tasks in the <token>azportal</token>.

trans-unit.source: There are two portals: <token>azportal</token> and the <token>af_integration</token> portal.
trans-unit.target: There are two portals: <token>azportal</token> and the <token>af_integration</token> portal.

trans-unit.source: This topic focuses on the <token>azportal</token> tasks specific to <token>af_integration</token>.
trans-unit.target: This topic focuses on the <token>azportal</token> tasks specific to <token>af_integration</token>.

trans-unit.source: One of the first steps in using <token>af_integration_full</token> is to <legacyBold>determine your application needs</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: One of the first steps in using <token>af_integration_full</token> is to <legacyBold>determine your application needs</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: For example:

trans-unit.source: Will your business transactions grow over time?
trans-unit.target: Will your business transactions grow over time?

trans-unit.source: Are there peak times when your business needs more processing resources?
trans-unit.target: Are there peak times when your business needs more processing resources?

trans-unit.source: Are there times when your business needs less processing resources?
trans-unit.target: Are there times when your business needs less processing resources?

trans-unit.source: Do you have multiple EDI partners and require multiple agreements with these partners?
trans-unit.target: Do you have multiple EDI partners and require multiple agreements with these partners?

trans-unit.source: Does your application get or put data in an on-premises system, like SQL Server or Oracle?
trans-unit.target: Does your application get or put data in an on-premises system, like SQL Server or Oracle?

trans-unit.source: The answers to these questions and more determine which <token>af_integration</token> edition is right for you.
trans-unit.target: The answers to these questions and more determine which <token>af_integration</token> edition is right for you.

trans-unit.source: Relevant link:
trans-unit.target: Relevant link:

trans-unit.source: BizTalk Services: Editions Chart
trans-unit.target: BizTalk Services: Editions Chart

trans-unit.source: After you determine your application needs, you <legacyBold>create the BizTalk Service</legacyBold> in the <token>azportal</token>.
trans-unit.target: After you determine your application needs, you <legacyBold>create the BizTalk Service</legacyBold> in the <token>azportal</token>.

trans-unit.source: This BizTalk Service hosts and runs your deployed applications (created in <token>vsprvs</token>).
trans-unit.target: This BizTalk Service hosts and runs your deployed applications (created in <token>vsprvs</token>).

trans-unit.source: You can have one BizTalk Service or many BizTalk Services; the choice depends on your design needs and wants.
trans-unit.target: You can have one BizTalk Service or many BizTalk Services; the choice depends on your design needs and wants.

trans-unit.source: Many users have multiple BizTalk Services.
trans-unit.target: Many users have multiple BizTalk Services.

trans-unit.source: Relevant link:
trans-unit.target: Relevant link:

trans-unit.source: Create a BizTalk Service using Azure management portal
trans-unit.target: Create a BizTalk Service using Azure management portal

trans-unit.source: When the BizTalk Service is created, <legacyBold>a deployment URL and security-related user/key pairs are created</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: When the BizTalk Service is created, <legacyBold>a deployment URL and security-related user/key pairs are created</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: This deployment URL is your online link to your BizTalk Service on <token>azure_1</token>.
trans-unit.target: This deployment URL is your online link to your BizTalk Service on <token>azure_1</token>.

trans-unit.source: There are two sets of User/Key pairs:
trans-unit.target: There are two sets of User/Key pairs:

trans-unit.source: <token>ac2</token> issuer name and issuer key
trans-unit.target: <token>ac2</token> issuer name and issuer key

trans-unit.source: <token>sb2</token> issuer name and issuer key
trans-unit.target: <token>sb2</token> issuer name and issuer key

trans-unit.source: You share the deployment URL and these user/key pairs with your developer to deploy the <token>af_integration</token> project.
trans-unit.target: You share the deployment URL and these user/key pairs with your developer to deploy the <token>af_integration</token> project.

trans-unit.source: Relevant link:
trans-unit.target: Relevant link:

trans-unit.source: BizTalk Services: Issuer Name and Issuer Key
trans-unit.target: BizTalk Services: Issuer Name and Issuer Key

trans-unit.source: After the project is deployed and running on <token>azure_1</token>, you can <legacyBold>monitor the status and performance</legacyBold> of the BizTalk Service.
trans-unit.target: After the project is deployed and running on <token>azure_1</token>, you can <legacyBold>monitor the status and performance</legacyBold> of the BizTalk Service.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can:
trans-unit.target: For example, you can:

trans-unit.source: Determine if the BizTalk Service is started or stopped.
trans-unit.target: Determine if the BizTalk Service is started or stopped.

trans-unit.source: See how many messages are sent or received.
trans-unit.target: See how many messages are sent or received.

trans-unit.source: Create a backup of the BizTalk Service.
trans-unit.target: Create a backup of the BizTalk Service.

trans-unit.source: View the properties of your BizTalk Service, including the deployment URL and the user/key pairs.
trans-unit.target: View the properties of your BizTalk Service, including the deployment URL and the user/key pairs.

trans-unit.target: Relevant link:

trans-unit.target: BizTalk Services: Dashboard, Monitor, Scale, Configure, and Hybrid Connection tabs
